title: Best Banana BreadThe Healthy Version of Going Bananas Bread
directions: Sift together flour, soda and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Add vanilla.
Pour into greased and floured loaf pan.
Spray a bundt pan with cooking spray, set aside.
Combine dry ingredients in med bowl, wisk to combine. Add nuts and chipits if using.
Beat eggs and sugar together at med/hi speed until creamy.
Pour into prepared pan and pop it in the oven. Once the door is closed reduce the heat so it's between 325 and 350°F.
Cake is done as soon as tester comes out clean. Do not overbake as fat free products may become dry.
Invert on rack, remove pan, cool and store in air tight container.
ingredients: 3⁄4 cup sugar free spiced unsweetened applesauce (I use homemade)
2 cups very ripe mashed bananas (4-5 whole)
